name: Crime Guy In City
description:
Stop for nothing as you jump into a real city crime spree, stealing cars, sell them for a living. If you want to become a real big time gangster you need get the power on the streets of crime.

*** GAME FEATURES ***
- This exciting and dynamic game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
- Great graphics.
- Easy controls.
- Advanced real physics engine.
- Interesting missions.
